responsibilities: Build ML models that push state-of-the-art either using Netflixs unique dataset or algorithmic innovations or both.

Stay abreast of the latest developments in the field by attending conferences, reading research papers and implementing promising novel ideas that can impact Studio workflows.
Engage with the ML community, internal and external, to learn, to teach, to contribute to building a great Netflix brand in ML.
benefits: Compensation structure consists solely of an annual salary; no bonuses.

job_info.title: Machine Learning Scientist L4/L5 (Studio Media Algorithms)

education: PhD in Computer Science, Engineering, Statistics, or a related quantitative field, or equivalent practical experience.
required_skills: Strong foundation in machine learning theory and application
Proficiency in ML frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch)
Experience developing and deploying scalable ML systems
Expertise in statistical modeling and causal inference
preferred_skills: Experience with large-scale data processing (e.g., Spark)
Familiarity with media technology or computer vision/audio processing

description.summary: Netflix is seeking a Machine Learning Scientist (L4/L5) to join the Studio Media Algorithms team, focusing on developing and deploying ML solutions to optimize content creation and production workflows.
responsibilities: Design, implement, and deploy state-of-the-art machine learning models to solve complex problems in media and content pipelines.
Collaborate with engineers and product managers to integrate ML solutions into production systems.
Conduct rigorous experimentation and evaluation of model performance.
Stay current with the latest research in ML and propose novel approaches.
benefits: Competitive compensation and comprehensive benefits package (implied by Netflix standard postings, though not explicitly listed here).
